page.title: 15An Elderly Kingswood Person.
page.content: This typical{elderly person}is 69 years old and she lives on the top floor of a two storey block of{old {peoples' flats.}The flats are modern but she complains that she is disturbed by traffic noise from the main road nearby. The{flat}possesses only one gas wall heater which she finds inadequate in winter. She enjoys living in the area because she can visit her family who live nearby. She enjoys listening to a{local radio station during the day and watching {television}in the evening. She goes to bed at 2130. She is frightened to leave her flat at night for fear of being attacked. She spends a lot of her{spare time}knitting and has produced items for various charities including appeals for{Mother Theresa and{Ethiopian Famine Relief.
